name: Jhankar Mahbub
message: It's a luxury car in this segment and the fastest car in the world. This is my dream car. The comfort of this car is fantastic.

name: Hasin Hayder
message: This car is a real super car and if you only want speed not care about sound so you can go for this sports model.

name: Moshiur Rahman
message: Best car for sports purposes. No one can beat this car. This car is affordable for the one who loves sporting.

name: Sumit Saha
message: The car is good but the price is not good. It is stylish also but the maintenance cost is very expensive.

name: Anisur Rahman
message: Buggati Chiron is my favorite car in the world. It is the fastest car in the world, and the material Bugatti Chiron uses for the air crafts build quality was awesome.
This is my dream car, I purchased it last year, it has a top speed of 320kmph. It is giving 6 to 9 kmpl mileage on the highway which is not good.
name: Anisul Islam
